home.title: Manage Your Content with FeedTune
home.subtitle: Collect, organize, and follow your RSS feeds and YouTube channels in one place. Never miss your favorite content creators!
home.getStartedDesc: Start using FeedTune for free and manage your content from a single place.

rssFeeds.title: RSS Feeds
rssFeeds.desc: Follow the latest content from your favorite blogs and news sites. Easily add and manage RSS feeds.

youtube.title: YouTube Integration
youtube.desc: Follow your favorite YouTube channels. See new videos instantly and never miss them.

autoUpdates.title: Automatic Updates
autoUpdates.desc: Content is updated automatically. You just focus on reading and watching.

organization.title: Easy Organization
organization.desc: Categorize your content, add to favorites, and mark as read.

keyboard.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard.desc: Navigate quickly and manage content with keyboard shortcuts.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.desc: Read comfortably at night with dark mode that doesn't strain your eyes.

feedManagement.title: Feed Management
feedManagement.description: View and manage your recently added feeds
feedManagement.noFeeds: You haven't added any feeds yet

feeds.title: My Feeds
feeds.description: View content from your followed sources

addYoutubeFeed.title: Add YouTube Channel
addYoutubeFeed.channelIdInvalid: Please enter a valid Channel ID, URL, or username

deleteFeed.title: Delete Feed
deleteFeed.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this feed? This action cannot be undone.
deleteFeed.success: Feed and all related data deleted successfully

feedList.title: My Feeds
feedList.description: View content from your followed sources
feedList.noFeeds: You haven't added any feeds yet
feedList.emptyState: No content found matching the selected filters

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: You can use the following keyboard shortcuts to navigate faster

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.noFavorites: You don't have any favorite content yet
favorites.addToFavorites: Visit the feeds page to add content to favorites

readLater.title: Read Later
readLater.description: View content you've saved to read later
readLater.noItems: You don't have any items in your read later list yet
readLater.addToReadLater: Visit the feeds page to add content to your read later list

settings.title: Settings
settings.themeDescription: Customize how FeedTune looks on your device
settings.compactModeDescription: Display content in a more compact way
settings.feedRefreshDescription: Choose how often feeds are updated
settings.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

errors.unauthorized: You must be logged in to perform this action
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action
